Class Buttons

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • Buttons
  • public class Buttons
extends greenfoot.Actor
    Buttons is just a class to make button objects, there is really not much else to it It takes an image and some params and scales it to make a button I only have 3 buttons so I made custom sprite images instead of just using regular fonts. They are kind of ugly, but what can I say lol.
    Version:
    2019/11/16
    Author:
    Dante Romey

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Buttons​(greenfoot.GreenfootImage img, int scaleX, int scaleY)
      Creates the image for the button with the image param and scales it by using the integer parameters provided
